thread.title: Intex Aqua Lions 4G with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 5,499
thread.title_full: Intex Aqua Lions 4G with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 5,499

title: Intex Aqua Lions 4G with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 5,499
text:
Intex Aqua Lions 4G with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs... Intex Aqua Lions 4G with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 5,499 By -   Aqua Lions 4G is an entry-level offering with a quad-core SoC and 8GB of storage‚Äù 
Intex recently launched the Aqua Crystal and Aqua Supreme+ budget VoLTE-enabled smartphones. Now the company has quietly launched yet another budget offering called the Intex Aqua Lions 4G. The dual-SIM smartphone offers 4G and VoLTE (voice over LTE), and boots 6.0 Marshmallow. 
The Intex Aqua Lions 4G sports a 5-inch display bearing a resolution of 480 x 854 pixels. The phone is powered by a 1.3GHz quad-core Spreadtrum processor, mated to Mali 400 graphics and 1GB of RAM. The storage capacity on board is 8GB, which can be further increased by another 64GB by inserting a microSD card. 
The camera department on the Aqua Lions 4G includes a 5-megapoxel autofocus rear snapper with an LED flash and HDR, and a 2-megapixel front-facing selfie shooter. Apart from 4G and VoLTE, the other connectivity options include Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and GPS. A 2,000mAh battery keeps it running, which is rated to deliver eight hours of talk time and 350 hours of standby time. 
The Intex Aqua Lions 4G has been priced at Rs 5,499, and comes in grey and champagne hues. The phone will be available via major brick-and-mortar retail stores across the country in the coming days.
